com.mesosphere.sdk.offer

Class TaskUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.TaskUtils

  • public class TaskUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utility methods for manipulating data in TaskInfos.

      • getTaskNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTaskNames(PodInstance podInstance,
                                                            java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> tasksToLaunch)
        Returns all the task names for a pod, after filtering based on the passed in list of tasks to launch.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - A PodInstance
        tasksToLaunch - The names of TaskSpecs which should be launched.
        Returns:
        A list of the appropriate task names.

      • getPodTasks

        public static java.util.List<TaskInfo> getPodTasks(PodInstance podInstance,
                                                   StateStore stateStore)
        Returns the TaskInfos associated with a PodInstance if its ever been launched. The list will be empty if the PodInstance has never been launched.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - A PodInstance
        stateStore - A StateStore to search for the appropriate TaskInfos.
        Returns:
        The list of TaskInfos associated with a PodInstance.

      • getTaskInfosShouldBeRunning

        public static java.util.List<TaskInfo> getTaskInfosShouldBeRunning(PodInstance podInstance,
                                                                   StateStore stateStore)
        Returns the TaskInfos for a PodInstance which should be running. The list will be empty if the PodInstance has never been launched.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - A PodInstance
        stateStore - A StateStore to search for the appropriate TaskInfos.
        Returns:
        The list of TaskInfos associate with a PodInstance which should be running.

      • getExecutor

        public static java.util.Optional<ExecutorInfo> getExecutor(PodInstance podInstance,
                                                           StateStore stateStore)
        Returns the ExecutorInfo of a PodInstance if it is still running so it may be re-used.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - A PodInstance
        stateStore - A StateStore to search for the appropriate TaskInfos.
        Returns:
        The ExecutorInfo if the Executor is running, Optional.empty() otherwise.

      • areDifferent

        public static boolean areDifferent(TaskSpec oldTaskSpec,
                                   TaskSpec newTaskSpec)
        Determines whether two TaskSpecs are different.
        Parameters:
        oldTaskSpec - The previous definition of a Task.
        newTaskSpec - The new definition of a Task.
        Returns:
        true if the Tasks are different, false otherwise.

                                     java.lang.String taskName)
                              throws TaskException

        Parameters:

        taskName - The name of the Task whose goal state is desired
        Returns:

        Throws:
        TaskException - is thrown when unable to determine a task's GoalState

        public static boolean needsRecovery(TaskSpec taskSpec,
                                    TaskStatus taskStatus)
        Determines whether a Task needs to eb reovered based on its current definition (TaskSpec) and status (TaskStatus).
        Parameters:

        taskStatus - The status of the task.
        Returns:

        Returns a default name for a Step given a PodInstance and the tasks to be launched in it.
        Parameters:
